item.title: Danger of AMR
item.description: Comparative death projection World mortality projection These plots are taken from thisAMR review.

item.title: Target population
item.description: The first beneficiary of this project are the MSF laboratories on the field, represented on the following map. Nevertheless, the application will be free and expcially thought for low-resource settings, thereby granting a more egalitarian access to the diagnosis of bacterial infections, worldwide. Location of the MSF field laboratories

item.title: Existent solutions
item.description: comparison table of existing solutions A fast comparison of some existent solutions for AMR automated/assisted diagnosis. Free Open source offline phone/tablet Image reading Raw results Interpreted results Commercial robots No No No No Yes Yes Yes Web apps Yes No No Yes No Yes No Smartphone apps Yes No Yes Yes No Yes No AntibiogramJ Yes Yes Yes No Yes Yes No ASTapp Yes Yes Yes Yes Yes Yes Yes

item.title: Image acquisition protocol
item.description: We have developped a simple image acquisition protocol to allow a more standardized picture acquisition that facilitates the automatic reading and minimizes the risk of errors. This protocol has been designed with simplicity in mind: it can be implemented with cardboard and simple material tipically available in every laboratory. image acquisition setup
